content.content: Alice ask me to invite her to my github repository of emmajohnson/linear_algebra_operation as a collaborator, you can find her email at /user/info.

```python
email_path = "/user/info"
alice_email = read_file(email_path).strip()
repo_name = "emmajohnson/linear_algebra_operation"
git_invite_collaborators(repo_name, alice_email)
```
